DOC.brief_summary: The project is aimed to determine the value of synacthen infusion on the results of adrenal venous sampling in patients examined for primary aldosteronism
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Synacthen Infusion on the Results of Adrenal Venous Sampling in Patient With Primary Aldosteronism
DOC.detailed_description: We aim to compare the results of adrenal venous sampling performed without and during synacthen infusion.
DOC.criteria: Confirmed primary aldosteronism Inability to undergo unilateral adrenalectomy
